MaxTreasureQuantity.description: Maximum amount of treasure you can find in a single chest while fishing.

AllowDuplicateLoot.description:
Whether the treasure randomizer should be allowed to select the same loot option
multiple times. Some loot can't be repeated even if duplicate loot is enabled.

InvertChancesOnPerfectCatch.description:
Whether to invert the chances of each treasure entry when you get a perfect catch and
treasure chest at the same time. For example, when this is enabled, getting a perfect
catch and treasure chest together would make an item that normally has a 1% chance of
showing in a chest instead have a 99% chance of appearing.

CatchSpeed.description: Affects how fast you catch treasure.

DrainSpeed.description: Affects how fast the treasure bar drains when the bobber isn't on the chest.

TreasureChances.description: The chances of finding treasure while fishing.

AdditionalLootChances.description:
The chances of getting additional loot when finding treasure. This is rolled until it
fails or the max number of items have been added to the loot.

MagnetFactor.description: The effect that the magnet bait has.

TreasureHunterFactor.description: The effect that the treasure hunter tackle has.

PirateFactor.description:
The effect that the pirate profession has. This is multiplied by your base chance
before being added.

BaseChance.description:
The base chance. Total chance is calculated as
locationFactor * (baseChance + sum(factor * thing it's a factor of)), bounded in the
range [minChance, maxChance], then bounded once again in the range [0, 1].

StreakFactor.description: The effect that streak has on this chance.

FishingLevelFactor.description: The effect that fishing level has on this chance.

DailyLuckFactor.description: The effect that daily luck has on this chance.

LuckLevelFactor.description: The effect that luck level has on this chance.

LocationFactors.description:
The effects that specific locations have on this chance. Keys are location names and
values are their factors.
